title: The Celebration
brief_description: A grandiose party to celebrate a sixtieth birthday unleashes a family drama with all the lies that conceal horrendous secrets. The eldest son, Christian, stages a showdown with the popular pater familias; his provocative, moving after-dinner speech dislodges all the masks, which finally fall completely as the father-son conflict intensifies and the bewildered guests look on.

constellations_other.name: A handheld aesthetic
constellations_other.description: Looking at the use of handycams and other consumer level devices in moving image works.
